name: Catch The Egg In The Basket
name_original: Catch The Egg In The Basket
description:
Catch The Egg In The Basket

Toss The Egg In The Basket is a delicious little game that turns a bit of basic physics into an incredible amount of fun! With adorable graphics and sounds, eggs Fun brings into your hands the quest of a determined little egg who must make it to the safety of a pail of water while avoiding nasty, though equally cute odds.

Collect stars and beat your own previously set records as you help the little egg escape eminent explosion at the prickles of mean smirking cactuii. Face new challenging levels while employing quick thinking and a variety of skills that keep enhancing as the game progresses. Never has physics been this enjoyable. Hours and hours of fun.enjoy
